moreInfo.title: About this site...
paragraphs: This site was developed by Joaquín Veirana using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind and Three.js.
The design is based on the website v4.brittanychiang.com created by Brittany Chiang.
The repository 'create-r3f-app' created by Utsubo was used as a reference for the 3D objects rendered by Three.js.
The example 'Terminal Text Effect' created by @Tbgse was used as a reference for the terminal text effect in the main section.

landing.description: I'm a computer engineer passionate about software development with a front end-oriented profile. Currently I'm working as a full stack developer at IBM Uruguay, having worked on a wide variety of projects.

about.title: About
paragraphs: Thank you for visiting my website!
My name is Joaquín, I'm a technology enthusiast and I enjoy creating cool software solutions, focused on the end user experience and with good practices on the source code.

I worked with different technologies such as Java, Python and JavaScript, with the latter being my favorite and the one I have the most experience with. I worked both on front end frameworks and libraries such as Angular and React, and also on back end with Node.js.
I studied computer engineering at the University of the Republic in Uruguay and graduated in 2023. Currently, I'm working as a full stack developer at IBM Uruguay.
In my free time I also enjoy learning in other tech areas such as machine learning, video game development and mobile development.
These are the technologies I mainly work with:

keyPoints: Front end development of internal client management web applications in Angular. Rebuilding them with more modern technology and improving their user experience and interface.
Development of libraries in Angular from components commonly used in different applications in order to speed up development through the reuse of components.
Back end development of batch applications and small REST APIs in Java 8 and 11 in conjunction with frameworks such as Spring Boot and Apache Camel.
Maintenance of applications hosted both on IBM Cloud and On-premise on the client servers, making improvements and error corrections.
Management of cloud services on IBM Cloud used by the client on different software solutions.

jobs.company: Computer Institute, Faculty of Engineering, University of the Republic
keyPoints: Continuation of the Smart Campus and Internet of Things work carried out in my degree project, with the aim of carrying out a productive deployment in the Faculty using the prototype developed in the degree project.
Maintenance and coding updates for the sensors devices created, using C++, Espressif and PlatformIO.
Management of ThingsBoard, the Internet of Things platform used for the Smart Campus.

Extensive participation in the development of a web application for a well-known national newspaper. Built with React, Node.js and MongoDB, this application focused on the processing and arrangement of different metrics in the newspaper's publications.
Integration of machine learning services hosted on IBM Cloud into web applications through the use of the SDKs and REST APIs of said services.
Deployment of containerized web applications in Kubernetes and CloudFoundry on IBM Cloud.

projects.name: JV Web Portfolio
projects.description: JV Web Portfolio is my personal website developed in React.

projects.name: Smart FIng
projects.description: Project focused on Internet of Things (IoT) technologies, in which a design and implementation of a small-scale smart campus prototype in the Faculty of Engineering is addressed.

projects.name: Faux The Game
projects.description: Faux is a mobile app developed in Flutter available in the Google Play Store. In Faux you can create and play matches of an entertaining party game of drawing and hidden roles. It is inspired by the game 'A Fake Artist Goes to New York' created by Jun Sasaki.

contact.title: Contact
contact.mainParagraph: Do not hesitate to send me an email to contact me, I will respond as soon as possible :)
